short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Perform API testing with Postmann, inspired by Postman. Handle GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, UPDATE, DELETE HTTP requests with precision.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Postmann v1.1.0 [Apr 28, 2024] - Elevate Your API Testing Experience!

Postmann, the intelligent REST Client for API testing, redefines your testing experience on Google Chrome. Built for Developers, DevOps engineers, and Testers. Postmann offers robust testing for HTTP requests in a user-friendly interface, enabling you to seamlessly send GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, and DELETE requests.

⭐ What's New in v1.1.0:

👉 Variables
👉 History
👉 Notes
👉 Modify Request Headers
👉 UI Improvements
👉 See the Changelog in GitHub for more info.

🔧 Key Features:

• Fetch Response Body (in pretty, raw, image, pdf, binary octet-stream)
• Get complete Headers
• Get response code, time, and size
• Supported responses: JSON, HTML, Text (e.g. robots.txt), XML, Image, PDF, Octet-Stream
• User-friendly design to effortlessly interpret server responses.

📚 Please Note:

• Postmann exclusively supports HTTP requests and does NOT cater to GraphQL, WebSocket, Socket.io, gRPC, or MQTT protocols yet.

👩‍💻 Get Started:

• Add to Chrome
• Pin it in the extensions toolbar
• Click on the Postmann icon and start testing your APIs
• Click on the GitHub link in the Postman extension, I have listed some free APIs there for you to test
• Please do not forget to rate & review the extension
• Donate if you like the extension and would like to support continued development of this extension

🌐 Open Source:

• Postmann is an open-source tool. Check out the code on GitHub.
